name: 3 Jaw Inner Bearing Puller Set | Blind Bearing Puller Set, Bushing Gear Extractor Wheel Bearing Puller Kit - Heavy Duty Pilot Gear Extractor for Motorcycle, Car, and SUV
short_description: Premium Quality: Crafted from durable carbon steel with a black oxide finish, our inner bearing puller is heat-treated for exceptional strength and longevity. The corrosion-resistant coating ensures optimal performance and protection.

Efficient and Stable: With its three-jaw design, our puller applies even pressure, preventing any damage to the bearings. The jaws are forged and heat treated to ensure stability during use, providing a reliable and secure grip.

Powerful Performance: The structured design of our automatic bushing gear extractor allows for a strong pulling force with minimal effort. Simply turn the small wrench gently, and experience the impressive pulling power for effective bearing removal.

Wide Compatibility: The 3-jaw inner bearing puller is designed to remove all sleeve-type bearings ranging from 0.7"-1.5" in diameter. It is a versatile tool suitable for various applications, ensuring convenience and efficiency.

Versatile Application: Our 3-Jaw Inner Bearing Puller is perfect for a wide range of uses, including automotive flywheels, motorcycle and bicycle wheels, pump and generator bearings, and machine bearings.

The collets range from 8 to 32 mm, and the slide hammer measures 1.2 ft (360 mm) in length, suitable for a wide range of applications.

short_description: 8PC. SLIDE HAMMER SET: This 8-piece professional axle, bearing, and seal removal tool set by Orion Motor Tech provides a 5/8" slide hammer, yoke, locknut, hook, and adapters to let you quickly, easily, and safely repair rear axle problems on the vast majority of domestic cars and light trucks

name: 3" 4" 6" 8" Gear Puller Set, 2-Jaw/3-Jaw Bearing Puller Kit with Ratchet Wrench, Heavy Duty Pulling Tool, Reversible Jaw for Internal External Flywheel Gear Pulley Bearing Rotor Removal
short_description: Professional Puller Set: SEEKSELF Pullers are forged from high-strength heat-treated CrV steel, and equipped with thickened connecting plates and non-slip spacers for light/heavy duty work. It also comes with a labor-saving ratchet wrench and sockets, detailed instruction manual, sturdy blow-molded storage box and beautiful packaging.

Reversible 2 or 3 Jaws Design: For easy storage, the tool needs to be assembled. Can be assembled as a two or three jaw puller (sharing the same set of brackets). Reversible jaws make it possible to convert from an external to an internal puller. Comes with detailed illustrated instructions and wrenches.

Application: It can be used to remove gears, bearings, flywheels, hubs, ball races, crank pulleys, stuck rotors and sprockets, etc. (Before purchase, measure whether it meets the maximum working range of the pullers).

Size Range: 4 different sizes of gear pullers are available by assembly. The maximum reach can exceed 3", 4", 6" and 8" (i.e. 75mm/100mm/150mm/200mm) when mounted to the lower mounting holes, and can be extended to 4.7", 6.7", 7.5" and 9.1" (i.e. 120mm/170mm/190mm/230mm) when switched to the upper mounting holes, covering common size ranges.

Packing List: This Gear Bearing Puller Kit includes 4 sets of Jaw Pullers (assembly required), 1PCS 3/8-Inch Drive Ratchet Wrench with 3PCS Sockets(15mm, 18mm, 20mm), 2 sets of open-end wrenches are used for installation. It also comes with a nice instruction manual and packaging.

Quality and Durability: The Gear Bearing Removal Tool set is suitable for both light and heavy work. The tool is forged from heat-treated CrV steel, which ensures the strength and durability of the Jaws and Ejector Rod. The surface of the jaw is finely polished, and the appearance texture is better. The thickened connecting plates, non-slip gaskets, and reinforced ejector rods make heavy-duty work more reliable.

Tips: 1. Before operation, make sure that all jaws have firmly grasped the gears/bearings, etc.; 2. The set already includes the wrenches needed for assembly and disassembly. 2. Use the included wrench, or use it with your impact wrench, which is more labor-saving.

name: 12pcs Bicycles Blind Hole Bearing Puller Set with Slide Hammer Internal Bearing Extractor Puller Kit with 8PCS Expandable Collets Size 8-32MM
short_description: Professionelle Bearing Puller Set: The 12pcs Bearing Puller Set is suitable for extracting bearings in blind holes (where the bearing is recessed and cannot be reached from behind), such as those found in bicycle, motorcycle, ATVs and automotive wheel assemblies. This kit includes a range of tools, including a slide hammer, 8*expanding collets, and drive pins. Gives good flexibility in removing bearings.

Adjustable and Multiple Size Options (collets size 8-32mm)：There are two different sized drive pins, with the smaller fitting the 5 collets from 8mm thru 20mm, and with the larger drive pins being used on the 3 larger collets from 20mm to 32mm in size. 8 pcs expandable collets from 8 to 32 mm (5/16 in. - 5/4 in.)

Easy to Use : When the expansion collet is inserted into the bearing, it expands to grip the inner race, allowing for a secure hold and effective bearing extraction. A good grip can be maintained when it is necessary to remove a bearing buried deep in a blind hole. For detailed operating steps, please refer to the instruction manual included in the package.

Saves Time and Effort: Slide hammer length: 1.2 ft (36 cm). The slide hammer provides the force necessary to safely and efficiently remove bearings, especially stubborn or tightly pressed bearings, without damaging surrounding components. This feature makes the process quicker and more efficient than using manual pullers alone, thus saving time and effort for both professional mechanics and DIY enthusiasts.

Durability and Quality Construction: The components of the kit, including the slide hammer and pullers, are made from high-quality steel to withstand the forces involved in bearing removal, ensuring the tool can withstand regular use without premature wear and, offering a long service life with proper care.
